articles.title: Kim Jong Un Visits Kumsong Tractor Factory
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Visits Kumsong Tractor Factory
 Pyongyang, November 15 (KCNA) -- Kim Jong Un, chairman of the Workers' Party of Korea, chairman of the State Affairs Commission of the DPRK and supreme commander of the Korean People's Army, gave field guidance to the Kumsong Tractor Factory which successfully carried out the task for production of new-type tractors, entrusted by the Party, in the revolutionary spirit of self-reliance.
					 He looked round the room for education in the revolutionary history and the room dedicated to the history of the factory.
					
					 Noting that President Kim Il Sung visited the factory 34 times and leader Kim Jong Il ten times, he said that, through the figures alone, one can well know about the immortal guidance feats performed by the great leaders for the development of the Juche-based tractor industry.
					
					 Seeing with deep emotion the photos of Kim Il Sung watching the Chollima tractor made by the workers of the factory on Nov. 14, 1958 and Kim Jong Il giving important instructions for the factory's development before the newly-made tractor Chollima-2000, he stressed it is thanks to their devoted efforts that the factory could register brilliant successes in the struggle to realize the comprehensive mechanization of agriculture over the past years.
					
					 The respected Supreme Leader examined new-type 80 h.p. tractors, Chollima-804, produced at the factory.
					
					 Watching with a bright smile in his face hundreds of blue-pained tractors standing in rows, he said with high appreciation that it is very spectacular and that the factory made a great success.
					
					 He personally rode on a tractor and drove it to learn in detail about its performance and technical specifications.
					
					 Saying that the workers of the factory who set the great era of Chollima in a ferment with the production of the first Chollima tractor are adding shine to the present era of Mallima with the production of new-type tractor Chollima-804, he stressed that the buzzing sound of the 80 h.p. tractor, a proud creation of the era of Mallima, represents the grand march of Socialist Korea.
					
					 Then he went round processing and assembling workshop, sheet metal processing workshop, casting workshop and other parts of the factory and set forth its tractor production assignment for next year as well as the task for its modernization.
					
					 Another revolution should be made in positively propelling the development of the country's vehicle industry through a project of upgrading the Kumsong Tractor Factory, he said, showing benevolence for the renovation of the factory and promising that he would dispatch a powerful building force of the people's army.
					
					 He had a photo session with the labor innovators of the factory.
					
					 Accompanying him were Pak Pong Ju, member of the Presidium of the Political Bureau of the Central Committee of the WPK, vice-chairman of the State Affairs Commission of the DPRK and premier of the Cabinet, O Su Yong, vice-chairman of the C.C., WPK, and Jo Yong Won, vice department director of the C.C., WPK.

articles.title: Special Envoy of Xi Jinping to Visit DPRK
articles.content:
Special Envoy of Xi Jinping to Visit DPRK
 Pyongyang, November 15 (KCNA) -- Song Tao, head of the International Liaison Department of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of China, will soon visit the Democratic People's Republic of Korea as a special envoy of Xi Jinping, general secretary of the C.C., CPC.

articles.title: Premier Inspects Kim Jong Thae Electric Locomotive Complex
articles.content:
Premier Inspects Kim Jong Thae Electric Locomotive Complex
 Pyongyang, November 15 (KCNA) -- Premier Pak Pong Ju, member of the Presidium of the Political Bureau of the C.C., Workers' Party of Korea and vice-chairman of the State Affairs Commission of the DPRK, made a field survey of the Kim Jong Thae Electric Locomotive Complex.
					 Going round its locomotive assembling shop, Pak inspired the workers in their efforts to raise a flame of upswing in production.
					
					 Then followed a consultative meeting which discussed the measures arising in the production of Korean-style underground electric cars, while underscoring the need for the relevant units to provide spare parts necessary to re-equip and repair the electric cars in good time.
					
					 Earlier, the premier learned in detail about the farming in South Hwanghae Province and discussed the matters related to the agricultural production in the province.

articles.title: Press Statement of DPRK Permanent Mission to UN
articles.content:
Press Statement of DPRK Permanent Mission to UN
 Pyongyang, November 15 (KCNA) -- The Permanent Mission of the Democratic People's Republic of Korea (DPRK) to the United Nations issued the following press statement with regard to the forced adoption of the "draft resolution" on human rights situation in the DPRK (A/C.3/72/L.40) submitted by the European Union (EU) and Japan at the Third Committee of the 72nd Session of the UN General Assembly on November 14, 2017:
					 The DPRK Permanent Mission to the UN categorically rejects the "resolution".
					
					 The "resolution" represents a product of the political and military confrontation, plot and conspiracy of the United States and other forces hostile to the DPRK as well as the extreme manifestation of politicization, selectivity and double standards of human rights. It has nothing to do for genuine promotion and protection of human rights. 
					
					 It repeats the contents of the "report of COI" which are full of lies, fabrications, plots and frauds concocted by the U.S. and other hostile forces through "defectors" who are criminals and human scum. It also pursues their heinous political purpose to overthrow our state and social system.
					
					 Now the U.S. and its vassal forces are more desperate in their "human rights" racket against the DPRK, while resorting to the unprecedented military threat and blackmail, sanctions and pressure against it.
					
					 Recently in the U.S., a "report on human rights abuses in north Korea and inspection of them" was submitted to the Congress. The 3rd "sanctions step for tackling the human rights performance in north Korea" was made public to include institutions and individuals of the DPRK in the "special sanctions list". The U.S. Congress orchestrated the anti-DPRK farce by letting betes noires make "testimonies" about "human rights abuses" in the DPRK at a hearing of the International Relations Committee of the Lower House.
					
					 The sanctions and pressure of the U.S. have the extremely vicious and barbarous phase in its attempt to violate the rights to survival and development of our State and people, destroy the modern civilization and turn the world back into a dark mediaeval age.
					
					 The indiscriminate blockade is being imposed to the DPRK under the pretext of implementing the "sanctions resolutions" cutting the delivery of medical equipment and medicine for treatment and health of patients, disabled persons and mothers and children and creating obstacles to the production of educational equipment and nutritional food for children.
					
					 It also causes the abnormal situation whereby most of the aid activities of international humanitarian organizations which worked in the DPRK for over 20 years have been frustrated or reduced.
					
					 These barbaric sanctions of the U.S. are a despicable violation of human rights and a genocide infringing upon the humanitarian laws and international human rights instruments including the Convention on the Economic, Social and Cultural Rights, Convention on the Rights of Child, Convention on the Elimination of All Forms of Discrimination against Women and Convention on the Rights of Persons with Disabilities. 
					
					 South Korea, which takes the lead in the U.S.-led anti-DPRK "human rights" racket, as well as the EU and Japan, the main sponsors of the draft "resolution" are actually not qualified to talk about others' human rights issues due to their record of so many extra large crimes against humanity.
					
					 The U.S. and other Western countries chant human rights and democracy in front of the world. But at their back, they break the UN Charter and human rights instruments desperately as these are contrary to their own interests. 
					
					 The United Nations should give priority to a discussion on their human rights violations and refer the criminals concerned to a court of justice. 
					
					 It is the consistent policy of the DPRK government to continue protection and promotion of the rights of the popular masses with full responsibility.
					
					 Despite persistent sanctions and pressure by the U.S. and other hostile forces, the DPRK government concentrates all its efforts on improving the people's standard of living and providing them with a better future.
					
					 It is the stark reality of the DPRK that such advantageous policies for the popular masses as universal free medical care, free education, free housing and gender equality continue to take effect and that all the people fully exercise and enjoy their rights in all sectors of social life.
					
					 Our people are boundlessly proud of their socialist system selected, consolidated and developed by their own will and also of their genuine system protecting and promoting the human rights which capitalism can neither have nor imitate.
					
					 The DPRK neither recognizes nor accepts the anti-DPRK "resolutions" railroaded through the Human Right Council and the Third Committee of the UNGA, as in the past.
					
					 The DPRK hopes for sincere dialogue and cooperation for genuine promotion and protection of human rights in the international human rights field, but will strongly respond to the end the confrontation and pressure to stifle our system.

articles.title: Economic and Commercial Councilors Corps Visits Pyongyang Cosmetics Factory
articles.content:
Economic and Commercial Councilors Corps Visits Pyongyang Cosmetics Factory
 Pyongyang, November 15 (KCNA) -- The economic and commercial councilors corps here Wednesday visited the Pyongyang Cosmetics Factory ahead of Mother's Day.
					 The guests went round the room for education in the revolutionary history, integrated production control room, sci-tech learning space, cosmetics shop, cosmetics institute, sample showroom and other parts of the factory, being briefed on the fact that it has been turned into a centre of the Korean cosmetics industry.

articles.title: Lao Embassy Officials Visit Sosin Vegetable Co-op Farm
articles.content:
Lao Embassy Officials Visit Sosin Vegetable Co-op Farm
 Pyongyang, November 15 (KCNA) -- Phonekham Inthaboualy, Lao ambassador to the DPRK, and his embassy officials Wednesday visited the Korea-Laos Friendship Sosin Vegetable Co-op Farm in Ryokpho District, Pyongyang.
					 Being briefed on the exploits performed by President Kim Il Sung for the farm, the guests went round the room for education in the revolutionary history, the room dedicated to the farm's history and other parts of the farm.

articles.title: First Anniversary of Kim Jong Un's Work Marked
articles.content:
First Anniversary of Kim Jong Un's Work Marked
 Pyongyang, November 15 (KCNA) -- A seminar took place at the Hall of Women Wednesday to mark the first publication anniversary of respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un's work "Let Us Further Intensify the Work of the Women's Union under the Banner of Modelling the Whole Society on Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism".
					 The seminar heard papers deeply explaining and proving the validity and scientific accuracy of the idea and theory advanced in the Supreme Leader's letter to those participants in the Sixth Congress of the Democratic Women's Union of Korea.
					
					 The speakers stressed his work is the important guidelines that makes the women's union fulfill its honorable responsibility and duty in the struggle to victoriously advance the Korean women's movement and accomplish the revolutionary cause of Juche under the banner of modeling the whole society on Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism.
					
					 The Korean women's movement is the women's movement of Juche which was started by President Kim Il Sung and had covered a proud course of its development under the guidance of the President and leader Kim Jong Il, they said.
					
					 They hardened the will to fully discharge their honorable mission and duty in the efforts to deeply grasp the idea and theory set forth by the Supreme Leader Un in his work and model the women's union on Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism.
					
					 Present at the seminar were Choe Hwi, vice-chairman of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea, and officials and members of the women's union.

articles.title: Exhibition of Achievements Made by Women's Union
articles.content:
Exhibition of Achievements Made by Women's Union
 Pyongyang, November 15 (KCNA) -- An exhibition of achievements made by the women's union and an experience-sharing of union officials took place at the Hall of Women on Wednesday to mark the first publication anniversary of respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un's work "Let Us Further Intensify the Work of the Women's Union under the Banner of Modelling the Whole Society on Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism".
					 Displayed at the exhibition were more than 770 exhibits of 160 kinds, visual aids and programs showing the successes made by the Central Committee of the Socialist Women's Union of Korea and its provincial committees for the past one year.
					
					 The experience-sharing heard speeches on the experience gained in the efforts to build up the women's union organizations into the ranks strong in organizing ability and unity in order to carry out the important tasks set forth by the Supreme Leader in his work.

articles.title: National Sci-Tech Presentation in Food Industry Held
articles.content:
National Sci-Tech Presentation in Food Industry Held
 Pyongyang, November 15 (KCNA) -- A national sci-tech presentation in the field of food industry took place at Pyongyang Han Tok Su University of Light Industry on Nov. 14-15 under the sponsorship of the C.C., the General Federation of Science and Technology of Korea.
					 Displayed at the presentation, divided into panels of food and fermentation, were more than 80 papers showing the achievements made in the work to put the production processes on a Juche and modern basis, activate the production with domestic raw and materials, develop new products and improve the quality of processed food.
					
					 There was a lecture on the current trend of the development of food industry.

articles.title: Doctorate Conferred on Former Researcher
articles.content:
Doctorate Conferred on Former Researcher
 Pyongyang, November 15 (KCNA) -- The DPRK doctorate was conferred on Choe Song Ho, former section chief of the Institute of Agricultural Mechanization, with due ceremony on Wednesday.
					 Choe invented an efficient rice-transplanting machine suited to the country's specific conditions, true to President Kim Il Sung's instruction on development of such machine.
					
					 When he completed the machine, the President named it "Taedonggang" and took a step to ensure its serial production, watching the machine working.
					
					 The President saw to it that Choe was awarded Technical Innovation Pioneer Prize (gold medal) for his contribution to the comprehensive mechanization of agriculture and called him to various national meetings, having a photo session with him.
					
					 Respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un made it sure that the title of Doctor of Engineering was conferred on Choe, after being told that he failed to present a thesis out of his incurable disease.

articles.title: Efficient Mobile Small Rice Harvester
articles.content:
Efficient Mobile Small Rice Harvester 
 Pyongyang, November 15 (KCNA) -- Recently, various types of rice harvesters were introduced into cooperative farms of the DPRK, proving effective.
					 Among them is a mobile small rice harvester introduced into some cooperative farms in Pyongyang.
					
					 An engine, gearbox and cab of the caterpillar harvester are arranged in a rational way.
					
					 The harvester can adjust the speed of advance, cutter bar and bat. The structure of the pickup reel was renovated and rolling gear of cutter bar and compression plate were newly made.

articles.title: Stone Sculpture of Three Buddhists in Mt Kumgang
articles.content:
Stone Sculpture of Three Buddhists in Mt Kumgang
 Pyongyang, November 15 (KCNA) -- There is a stone sculpture depicting the three Buddhists (Shakyamuni, Amitabha, Maitreya) in Inner Kumgang area of Mt Kumgang, one of the most noted mountains in Korea.
					 It was built in the period of Koryo (918-1392).
					
					 A triangle rock where three Buddhists are depicted is 8 meters high and 9 meters long and Buddhists 3.7 meters high and 1.3 meters wide.
					
					 The sculptural art of Korean ancestors is a precious historical relic in those days.
					
					 President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il visited Mt Kumgang for several times and instructed to preserve and manage historical relics and cultural remains well.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Sheds Light on Trump's Hideous Crimes
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Sheds Light on Trump's Hideous Crimes
 Pyongyang, November 15 (KCNA) -- Trump betrayed his true colors as an old lunatic, mean trickster and human reject during his one night and two days stay in south Korea, says Rodong Sinmun on Wednesday in a commentary.
					 Trump in his 35 minutes-long address to the "National Assembly" of south Korea, painted a black picture of the DPRK for 22 minutes, spouting all sorts of rubbish against it, only to stun the public, the commentary notes, and goes on:
					
					 The worst crime for which he can never be pardoned is that he dared malignantly hurt the dignity of the supreme leadership of the DPRK.
					
					 Trump, who is no more than an old slave of money, dared point an accusing finger at the sun. He should know that he is just a hideous criminal sentenced to death by the Korean people.
					
					 He will be forced to pay dearly for his blasphemy any moment.
					
					 The second on the list of his hideous crimes is that he malignantly hurt the dignified DPRK and Korean-style socialist system.
					
					 Korean-style socialism centered on the popular masses which made its appearance in denial of the exploiting system of capitalism at an inevitable stage of the development of history is t the most advantageous and scientific socialism embodying the nature of mankind to live independently.
					
					 Such a depraved guy as Trump, who is dreaming a pipedream of spreading venom of corrupt American capitalism in denial of the most advantageous social system of the DPRK, will never grasp the truth that injustice can never prevail over justice until his last breath, buried under the bulwark of the great single-minded unity of the DPRK.
					
					 The third of his thrice-cursed crimes is that he spouted a load of rubbish to paint a black picture of the happy life of the great Korean people.
					
					 The one who violated the dignity of the people and insulted them should never expect their pardon.
					
					 The Korean people will regard the face of Trump as a symbol of wolf-like U.S. imperialism and as a target of merciless retaliation and send him to the hell he likes so much to tout.
					
					 The fourth is that he twisted the history of justice and cried out for stifling the DPRK by force of violence.
					
					 The reckless remarks spouted by Trump during his junkets cannot but be viewed as the final confirmation of the White House's policy hostile to the DPRK, a total denial of the existence of the DPRK and an open declaration of war not to allow the existence of the Korean people any more.
					
					 Rabid dog's barking can never frighten the Korean people.
					
					 It is the principle and way of the DPRK to toughly react to any acts of hostility.
					
					 The U.S. will have to bitterly experience what it dislikes most and witness what it thought of in nightmare.

articles.title: U.S. Should Recognize Entity of DPRK as Nuclear Weapons State: Rodong Sinmun
articles.content:
U.S. Should Recognize Entity of DPRK as Nuclear Weapons State: Rodong Sinmun
 Pyongyang, November 15 (KCNA) -- Timed to coincide with Trump's visit to Asia, loud voices are heard among the U.S. experts on the Korean affairs and media persons that the Trump administration should change option related to the Korean affairs, says Rodong Sinmun Wednesday in a commentary.
					 It goes on:
					
					 The U.S. administration should take a serious note of the voices.
					
					 Citing data that the U.S. nuclear threat and blackmail do not started from the DPRK's access to nukes, the commentary goes on:
					
					 This made the DPRK have a conclusion that if it fails to counter the U.S. with nukes, it can not put an end to the U.S. nuclear threat and blackmail and remove the danger of a war. 
					
					 The DPRK's access to nuclear weapons and inter-continental ballistic rockets is a just choice for self-defense to counter the U.S. nuclear threat. Therefore, no one has right to fault with it.
					
					 The world's denuclearization is the aspiration and desire of humankind. If the aspiration and desire come true, U.S. and other countries that have the largest number of nuclear weapons should take the lead in denuclearization.
					
					 It is a foolish daydream for the Trump group to dream of the DPRK's dismantlement of nukes.
					
					 The U.S. should make strategic judgment well and make a policy decision to recognize, respect and coexist with the DPRK as nuclear weapons state.

articles.title: Japan's Bad Habit of Taking Issue with Others under Fire
articles.content:
Japan's Bad Habit of Taking Issue with Others under Fire
 Pyongyang, November 15 (KCNA) -- Ahead of Trump's visit to Japan its Prime Minister Abe said that Japan would "focus all efforts on cooperation with the U.S. and other countries for final solution of the abduction of Japanese." The Japanese ambassador to the U.S. expressed the welcome for the U.S. bid to recognize the "abduction issue" as an "important humanitarian matter and try to solve it with Japan.
					 Minju Joson Wednesday says in a commentary in this regard:
					
					 The mean behavior of the Japanese reactionaries begging the master for cooperation in settling the "abduction issue" reveals once again the cunningness of the islanders which is accustomed to meeting its interests by faulting with others.
					
					 Being stuck to the already settled "abduction issue," the Japanese reactionaries are taking issue with the Democratic People's Republic of Korea as they think that there would not any way to maintain the mechanism for pressurizing the DPRK without the "abduction issue".
					
					 Japan needs a reason to do wrongdoings and takes issue with other to make the reason. This bad habit of Japan is so foolish as to aggravate the regional situation and make itself isolated.
					
					 No country is going to be friendly with such country thinking and acting for its own egotistical purpose.
					
					 The Japanese reactionaries should behave themselves, bearing in mind that their mischievous acts would bring mishap to themselves.

articles.title: Demos around U.S. Embassy Launched in Seoul
articles.content:
Demos around U.S. Embassy Launched in Seoul
 Pyongyang, November 15 (KCNA) -- According to reports in Seoul, members of the south Korean youth resistance movement staged protest demonstrations towards the U.S. embassy in Seoul on October 17 and November 1 and 13.
					 They urged the U.S. to immediately stop its nuclear war drills against the north with three nuclear carrier task forces involved.
					
					 They staunchly resisted the puppet policemen's crackdown.
					
					 The above-said organization was formed in October by students and youth and young workers against a war and for peace on the Korean peninsula.
					
					 Meanwhile, the People's Democratic Party is staging an all-night demo before the U.S. embassy in protest against the U.S. war moves.

articles.title: Revision of Humiliating FTA Protested in S. Korea
articles.content:
Revision of Humiliating FTA Protested in S. Korea
 Pyongyang, November 15 (KCNA) -- Farmers of south Korea reportedly protest against the puppet authorities that started revision of the humiliating FTA with the U.S.
					 The authorities announced that there would be a public hearing in Seoul on Nov. 10 to calm down the protest. 
					
					 Enraged by this, members of the FTA Countermeasure Committee held a press conference in front of the venue of the public hearing that day.
					
					 The Federation of Peasants Associations and the countermeasure committee involving organizations of agriculture and animal husbandry declared that they would not pardon the FTA revision.
					
					 They threw rotten eggs and shoes to officials of the "government".
					
					 The public hearing was cancelled by the struggle.
					
					 The organization held a press conference again after the cancellation of the public hearing, and said it would hold a rally of farmers on Nov. 18 and surely check the negotiation for revision of FTA.

articles.title: Front against U.S. Will Expand: S. Korean Internet Paper
articles.content:
Front against U.S. Will Expand: S. Korean Internet Paper
 Pyongyang, November 15 (KCNA) -- An editorial titled "War lunatic Trump, Stop Nuclear War Exercises against North at Once" was posted on the south Korean internet newspaper Minjok Ilbo on Nov. 13.
					 Charging that the U.S. nuclear carriers are staging joint military exercises against the north in the East Sea of Korea, the editorial said:
					
					 It was clearly disclosed that Trump's visit to Asia was a war junket to examine the preparations for a nuclear war against the north at the final phase and it was a brigandish one for the sale of American weapons, increase of the fund for the upkeep of the U.S. forces and the retrogressive revision of the "Free Trade Agreement".
					
					 The south Korean "government" danced to the tunes of Trump's brigandish junket for a war and even openly disclosed its nature as a servant of outsiders by letting huge forces take part in the war of aggression against the north.
					
					 Such "crazy strategy" of Trump will further expand the anti-U.S. front, the editorial warned.

articles.title: S. Korea: Joint Maritime Drills with U.S. Slammed
articles.content:
S. Korea: Joint Maritime Drills with U.S. Slammed
 Pyongyang, November 15 (KCNA) -- The People for Achieving Peace and Reunification in south Korea on Nov. 13 called a news conference outside the U.S. embassy in Seoul to demand halt to the U.S.-south Korea joint maritime drills, according to south Korean Yonhap News.
					 Speakers charged that the drills targeting the north would further aggravate the situation of the Korean peninsula.
					
					 They stressed that the halt to anti-DPRK war drills and the resumption of north-south and the DPRK-U.S. dialogue are a solution to the "north's nuclear issue".

articles.title: S. Korea: 30,000 Builders to Go on General Strike
articles.content:
S. Korea: 30,000 Builders to Go on General Strike
 Pyongyang, November 15 (KCNA) -- The union of builders under the south Korean Confederation of Trade Unions declared on Nov. 13 that it would go on a general strike in demand of revision of the law on improvement of employment of builders, the south Korean MBC said.
					 The union called a press conference outside the "National Assembly" building to denounce the "NA" for disregarding the "law on builders" and the basic labor rights.
					
					 It declared 30,000 unionists would go on an unlimited general strike on Nov. 28.

articles.title: Koreans in U.S. Urge Halt to S. Korean Regime's Sycophancy
articles.content:
Koreans in U.S. Urge Halt to S. Korean Regime's Sycophancy
Pyongyang, November 15 (KCNA) -- A spokesperson of the Federation of Koreans in the U.S. on Nov. 9 made public a statement blasting the south Korean puppet authorities for blindly toeing the U.S. line.
					The statement condemned the south Korean authorities for having built the largest-ever nuclear base of the U.S. army in Phyongtaek in a bid to invade the north and poured a huge amount of money upon the U.S. under the pretext of the purchase of U.S.-made weapons.
					
					It also sniped at the Moon Jae In "government" for making a "proposal for independent sanctions on the north", timed to coincide Trump's visit to south Korea.
					
					The statement stressed that the south Korean regime should stop dancing to the tune of the U.S. desiring a fratricidal standoff and properly recognize the fact that national cooperation is more important than cooperation with outsiders.

articles.title: Happy Life of Korean Women Introduced by DR Congo Organization
articles.content:
Happy Life of Korean Women Introduced by DR Congo Organization
 Pyongyang, November 15 (KCNA) -- The National Committee for the Study of the Juche Idea of DR Congo posted an article titled "Mothers of socialist Korea" on its website on November 5.
					 The article said that the Democratic People's Republic of Korea significantly marks November 16 as the Day of Mothers every year.
					
					 It went on:
					
					 In the past days the Korean women could not complain of grievance even though their personality, dignity and right of mothers were subject to deep-rooted shackles of feudalism as members of a stateless nation, but they became to enjoy happiness under the warm care of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il.
					
					 Under the wise guidance of the peerlessly great men who made public works on the settlement of the women's issue and made sure that the women's role was enhanced in all aspects of the state and social life, the social and historic roots that shackled the freedom and right of women were completely eradicated in the DPRK.
					
					 The article noted that respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un is building a paradise of women and children in the DPRK by carrying forward the idea and cause of the great leaders.
					
					 Under his care, women are respected everywhere in the DPRK, the article added.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un recorre el Combinado de Tractores Kumsong
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un recorre el Combinado de Tractores Kumsong
Pyongyang, 15 de noviembre (ACNC) -- Kim Jong Un, Presidente del Partido del Trabajo de Corea y del Comite de Estado de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y Comandante Supremo del Ejercito Popular de Corea, dirigio en el terreno el Combinado de Tractores Kumsong que cumplio la tarea de produccion de tractores de nuevo tipo, asignada por el partido, haciendo uso del espiritu revolucionario de autoconfianza.
					Ante todo, el estuvo en la sala de educacion en la historia revolucionaria y otra de presentacion del historial.
					
					Recordo que el Presidente Kim Il Sung y el Dirigente Kim Jong Il visitaron esta planta en 34 y 10 ocasiones, respectivamente. 
					
					Prosiguio que solo con el numero de esas visitas se puede conocer las imperecederas hazanas de orientacion de los grandes lideres realizadas por el fortalecimiento y el desarrollo de la autoctona industria de tractores.
					
					Vio con profunda emocion la foto del Presidente examinando el 14 de noviembre de 1958 el tractor "Chollima" hecho por la clase obrera del combinado y la otra del Dirigente dando instrucciones importantes a cumplir por la fabrica delante del tractor "Chollima-2000" de nuevo modelo. 
					
					Anadio que gracias a la abnegacion y grandes esfuerzos de los lideres antecesores, la fabrica pudo lograr anteriormente exitos enorgullecedores en la lucha por la mecanizacion general de agricultura.
					
					El Maximo Dirigente paso revista a los tractores "Chollima-804" de 80hp de nuevo modelo, fabricados en la planta.
					
					Mirando sonriente cientos de nuevos tractores de color azul parados en hilera, dijo que son espectaculares y resulta tremendo exito la produccion de ellos.
					
					Subio al tractor y lo manejo personalmente para cerciorarse de las propiedades y especificaciones tecnicas del vehiculo.
					
					Los obreros del combinado, quienes glorificaron la gran epoca de Chollima con la produccion del primer tractor de marca "Chollima", repiten esa hazana en la epoca actual de Mallima mediante la produccion del tractor "Chollima-804" de nuevo modelo, apunto y agrego que el ruido del nuevo tractor, criatura orgullosa de la epoca de Mallima, significa la gran marcha de la Corea socialista.
					
					En su recorrido por varios puntos, inclusive los talleres de procesamiento y montaje, paileria y fundicion, presento la tarea de produccion para el proximo ano y la de modernizacion de la planta.
					
					Abogando por registrar otra revolucion para el desarrollo de la industria de vehiculos del pais mediante el remozamiento de la fabrica, dispenso grandes benevolencias para esta obra y prometio enviar competentes unidades de constructores del EPC.
					
					Al final, se fotografio con los innovadores en el trabajo de la fabrica.
					
					Le acompanaron en esta ocasion Pak Pong Ju, miembro del Presidium del Buro Politico del Comite Central del PTC, vicepresidente del CE de la RPDC y primer ministro del Consejo de Ministros de la RPDC, O Su Yong, vicepresidente del CC del PTC, y Jo Yong Won, subjefe de departamento del CC del PTC.

articles.title: Enviado especial de Xi Jinping visitara a RPDC
articles.content:
Enviado especial de Xi Jinping visitara a RPDC
Pyongyang, 15 de noviembre (ACNC) -- En calidad del enviado especial de Xi Jinping, Secretario General del Comite Central del Partido Comunista de China, Song Tao, jefe del Departamento de Enlace Internacional del CC del PCCh, visitara pronto a la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea.

articles.title: Representacion permanente coreana en la ONU publica comunicado
articles.content:
Representacion permanente coreana en la ONU publica comunicado
Pyongyang, 15 de noviembre (ACNC) -- En relacion con que en el tercer comite de la 72a sesion de la Asamblea General de la ONU fue aprobado de manera coercitiva el dia 14 el "proyecto de resolucion de derechos humanos" (A/C. 3/72/L.40) sobre la situacion de DDHH de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, presentado por la Union Europea y Japon, la representacion permanente de la RPDC acreditada en la ONU hizo publico el comunicado que sigue:
					 La Representacion Permanente de la RPDC en la ONU rechaza rotunda y totalmente la "resolucion de DDHH" anti-RPDC.
					
					 Siendo el producto de la confrontacion politica y militar, el complot y la confabulacion de EE.UU. y otras fuerzas hostiles contra la RPDC y el climax de la politizacion de DDHH, la selectividad y la pauta de doble rasero, la "resolucion" no tiene nada que ver con la proteccion y el fomento de los verdaderos derechos humanos.
					
					 Ese documento es copia del contenido del "informe del comite de investigacion" de DDHH de Corea, lleno de las mentiras, las falsificaciones, las intrigas y los fraudes, inventados por los "refugiados", quienes son los delincuentes y basuras humanas, a instigacion de EE.UU. y las fuerzas enemigas y persigue el malisimo objetivo politico de derribar el regimen social de la RPDC.
					
					  EE.UU. y sus satelites recurren mas desesperadamente a la campana de "DDHH" anti-RPDC, acompanando con la inaudita sancion, la presion y la amenaza militar contra el pais socialista.
					
					  Ultimamente, EE.UU. presento ante el Congreso el supuesto "informe sobre la violacion y la inspeccion de derechos humanos en el Norte de Corea" y publico la tercera "medida de sancion de DDHH del Norte" que incluye a los organos y las personas de la RPDC en la "lista de sancion especial".
					
					  Por otra parte, orquesto una farsa anti-RPDC en la audiencia de la Comision de Relaciones Exteriores de la Camara de Representantes del Congreso de EE.UU, ocasion en la cual las basuras humanas "testimoniaron" la "situacion de violacion de DDHH" de la RPDC.
					
					  Propasan ahora las maniobras anti-RPDC de EE.UU. encaminadas a exterminar los derechos a subsistencia y desarrollo del Estado y pueblo coreanos, destruir la civilizacion moderna y revocar el mundo al oscuro medieval.
					
					  Debido a las maniobras de bloqueo perpetradas indiscriminadamente bajo el rotulo de la ejecucion de la "resolucion de sancion", en la RPDC se producen los fenomenos anormales. Es decir, se interrumpio la entrega de los aparatos medicos y las medicinas para los enfermos, las madres, los ninos y los discapacitados, se crearon los obstaculos en la produccion de los equipamientos escolares de los alumnos y los alimentos nutritivos para la infancia, fue suspendida y reducida la mayoria de actividades de cooperacion de las organizaciones humanitarias internacionales que habian venido desarrollandose durante mas de 20 anos ultimos.
					
					La sancion barbara de EE.UU. deviene una violacion flagrante de DDHH y un crimen genocida que infringe la idea humanitarista  y los instrumentos internacionales de DDHH, inclusive la Convencion de los Derechos Economicos, Sociales, Culturales, la Convencion de los Derechos de la Infancia, la Convencion sobre la Eliminacion de Todas Formas de Discriminacion contra la Mujer y la Convencion sobre los Derechos de Personas con Discapacidades.
					
					El Sur de Corea, que ejecuta al frente la campana de DDHH patrocinada por EE.UU. contra la RPDC, y la Union Europea y Japon, promotores principales del "proyecto de resolucion de DDHH" anticoreana, no tienen calidad de deliberar este problema de otros debido al record de sus crimenes tan graves contra la humanidad.
					
					EE.UU. y otros paises occidentales preconizan los DDHH y la democracia a la vista del mundo, pero a las espaldas, rompen flagrantemente la Carta de la ONU y los instrumentos de DDHH cuando estos no convienen a sus intereses propios.
					
					La ONU deberia poner prioridad a la discusion de la violacion de DDHH de ellos y llevar a la corte de justicia a los criminales vinculados.
					
					Es la politica consistente del gobierno de la RPDC continuar protegiendo y promoviendo con total responsabilidad los derechos humanos de las masas populares.
					
					A pesar de las "sanciones" y presion persistentes de EE.UU. y otras fuerzas hostiles, el gobierno de la RPDC concentra todos sus esfuerzos en mejorar la vida del pueblo y prepararle un futuro mejor.
					
					Es la realidad irrefutable de la RPDC en que continuan surtiendo efectos las medidas superiores para las masas populares tales como la asistencia medica general gratuita, la educacion gratuita, la vivienda gratuita y la igualdad del hombre y la mujer y que todos los habitantes ejercen y disfrutan a sus anchas sus derechos humanos en todos los sectores de la vida social.
					
					El pueblo coreano tiene el infinito orgullo de su regimen socialista, optado y desarrollado con la voluntad propia, y de su genuino sistema de proteccion de DDHH que no puede tener ni imitar el capitalismo.
					
					Al igual que en el pasado, la RPDC nunca reconocera ni aceptara las "resoluciones" en su contra, aprobadas por la fuerza en el Consejo de DDHH de la ONU y el 3o comite de la Asamblea General de la ONU.
					
					La RPDC desea el dialogo y la cooperacion sinceros para la proteccion y promocion genuinas de DDHH en esta esfera internacional, pero respondera con intransigencia hasta el final a la confrontacion y la presion, destinadas a derrumbar su regimen.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun revela crimenes cometidos por Trump
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun revela crimenes cometidos por Trump
Pyongyang, 15 de noviembre (ACNC) -- Durante su visita de dos dias al Sur de Corea, Trump volvio a revelar su naturaleza de extrano maniaco, sucio estafador y basura humana sin par.
					 En la Asamblea Nacional del Sur de Corea, el pronuncio el discurso durante 35 minutos, gastando 22 minutos del tiempo para tergiversar con las blasfemias la realidad de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea.
					
					 Asi senala el diario Rodong Sinmun en un comentario individual difundido este miercoles y prosigue:
					
					  El primer crimen de los imperdonables cometidos por Trump es la atrevida ofensa a la maxima dignidad de la RPDC.
					
					  Por su maldad, Trump ya se hizo de un delincuente de pesima calana sentenciado a muerte por el pueblo coreano.
					
					  El pagara sin falta el precio muy caro por sus pecados imperdonables.
					
					  El segundo es que Trump difamo perversamente el Estado de alta dignidad y el regimen socialista al estilo coreano.
					
					  El socialismo coreano humanocentrico, nacido en la etapa inevitable de la historia en desarrollo negando el regimen explotador del capital, es el mas ventajoso y cientifico donde se materializo la naturaleza independiente del hombre.
					
					  Trump abriga una ilusion de derribar el regimen coreano mas ventajoso en el mundo y difundir el corrupto capitalismo al estilo norteamericano. Pero, no entendera nunca hasta el ultimo momento de su vida una verdad de que la oscura no puede vencer la luz.
					
					  El tercero es que Trump mancho la vida feliz del gran pueblo coreano.
					
					  El pueblo no tolera a quien atropello y burlo su dignidad.
					
					  Los coreanos tomaran represalias implacables para echar a Trump al infierno de que el suele hablar.
					
					  El cuarto es que Trump tergiverso la historia de justicia y disparateo que aplastara a su rival socialista con la fuerza de injusticia.
					
					  Sus locuras lanzadas a lo largo del mundo devienen la afirmacion final de la politica hostil a la RPDC de la Casa Blanca, la negacion total a la existencia de nuestro Estado y la abierta declaracion de guerra de no tolerar la existencia del pueblo coreano.
					
					  Un refran dice: ande yo caliente, riase la gente.
					
					Ojo por ojo y diente por diente, lo que es el principio y la ley de nosotros.
					
					  EE.UU. experimentara terriblemente lo mas indeseado y vera con sus propios ojos la escena horrible que llevara al pais norteamericano a la pesadilla.
